data.text: Pambeli Mfuki Mng'alili amulongushili Yesu mbaka kucheja ili ayeshiwi na Lijangavandu.
Kayikaja kulya majuva milongu mchechi pamusi na pamihi, pambeli kawona njala.
Topi, Mwafu kamwisila, kamuwombela “Leki yuwi kuva Mwana wa Chapanga nakaka, deti migonguveli ayi yivi filivi.”
Yesu kamuyangula, “Yiyandikiwa mumayandiku Vang'alili.
Pambeli Lijangavandu kamtola mbaka Yelusalemu, mbwani ying'alili, kamvika pambindi ya mnala wa nyumba ya Chapanga.
Kamuwombela, “Leki nakaka yuwi kuva mwana wa Chapanga, widangi pasi, kwanongwa yiyandikiwa mumayandiku Vang'alili
Yesu kavawombela, “Yiyandikiwa mumayandiku Vang'alili, ukotoo kumuyesha Chapanga, Bambu waku.”
Pambeli Lijangavandu kamtola mbaka pambindi ya chidunda chitali, kamlangusha wutwa shosi na ukomi waki.
Lijangavandu kamuwombela, “Fyosi afi ngukupa pawundundamila.”
Topi Yesu kamuwombela, “Kopoki apa Lijangavandu! Yiyandikiwa mumayandiku Vang'alili mtundamili Chapanga Bambu waku na kumkimbanikila mweni hela.”
Topi, Lijangavandu kawuka kamuleka Yesu na makungu vayisa, kumukimbanikila Yesu.
Yesu apikanilili kucha Yohani mbatisha vamutatila muchijaka, ayendili Galilaya.
Awukili Nasaleti, kayenda kwikala mumbwani ya Kapelinaumu, muluwongu ya lihiva lya Galilaya mumbaka ya wilaya ya Sebuloni na Nafutali.
Ayi yagolikili ili chila chilongu chadetili mbuyi wa Chapanga Isaya chivi,
“Mlima wa Sebuloni na mlima wa Nafutali
Vandu vayikalili kuchisi,
Kukandila chipindi achi Yesu akandili kulandula, padeta, “Mupomeli, kwanongwa wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga wuva pabehi!”

“Yesu patyangeyi muluwongu lwa lihiva lya Galilaya, avawonili vandu vavili yivavelili ulongu. Vavelili Simoni yivamkema Petili pamu na Andeleya, vaveli mulihiva vakufuva vasomba kwa lwafu. Veni vaveli vafuva.
Yesu kavawombela, mungovikeli, nenga danivagoli muvi vafuva va vandu.”
Bahala pala, vasileka njafu shawu, vamukovikela Yesu.
Payendili pawulongolu, kavawona vandu vengi vavili yivavelili ulongu, vavelili Yakobi na Yohani vana va Sebidayu, veni vavelili muwatu pamu na tati wawu pavasambula njafu shawu. Yesu kavakema.
Tepu vawulekili watu pamu na tati wawu, vamukovekela Yesu.
Yesu aveli akuyendayenda mumlima wosi wa Galilaya. Pawula munyumba sha kudadavila na kulandula Chilongu cha nyanyi cha wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga na kulowola matami kafwauti kafwauti.

Milandu yaki yakwilili mumlima wosi wa Siliya, vamuyeghela vandu vosi yivavelili na matami, vala yivavelili vakutamika na kuteshiwa, yivavelili na matami va finyamkela na chisilika na vapombalili vamuyeghilili na mweni kavalowola vosi.
Mipinga mikomi ya vandu yamukovikelili kufuma Galilaya na Dekapoli, mbwani yikemiwili Mbwani Lilongu na kufuma Yelusalemu na kufuma Yudeya na kufuma mbembu yingi ya Yoludani.
